Jerry Jones: the owner of the Dallas Cowboys, made the claim that the cheerleaders for the team have entertained more troops in the world than Bob Hope.
The claim was made during an interview w: s Mike and Mike, where Jones emphasized the location of the interview being at the area where the cheerleaders perform.
Bob Hope was known for his USO shows: where he entertained troops around the world for nearly 50 years, including annual Christmas tours for 35 consecutive years.
The USO: a nonprofit organization dedicated to uplifting the spirits of troops, stated that Hope entertained millions of United States service members in numerous countries, on ships at sea, and in combat zones ashore. However, the exact number of troops he entertained is uncertain.
